Interface ApplicantEnquiryService

All Superinterfaces:
BaseEnquiryService
All Known Implementing Classes:
EnquiryServiceImpl
public interface ApplicantEnquiryService extends BaseEnquiryService
Service interface defining operations related to applicants' enquiries. Allows submitting, editing, retrieving, and deleting enquiries.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    deleteEnquiry(int enquiryId, HDBApplicant applicant)
    Allows an applicant to delete an entire enquiry.

    Retrieves all enquiries made by a specific applicant.

  • Method Details

    • submitEnquiry

      Enquiry submitEnquiry(String message, HDBApplicant applicant, BTOProj proj)
      Submits a new enquiry by an applicant for a BTO project.
      Parameters:
      message - the enquiry content
      applicant - the applicant submitting
      proj - the BTO project concerned
      Returns:
      the created Enquiry

    • getEnquiriesByApplicant

      List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByApplicant(HDBApplicant applicant)
      Retrieves all enquiries made by a specific applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant
      Returns:
      list of enquiries

    • editOwnMessage

      boolean editOwnMessage(int enquiryId, String msgId, HDBApplicant applicant, String newContent)
      Allows an applicant to edit their own enquiry message.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - ID of the enquiry
      msgId - ID of the specific message
      applicant - the applicant attempting to edit
      newContent - new message content
      Returns:
      true if successful

    • deleteEnquiry

      boolean deleteEnquiry(int enquiryId, HDBApplicant applicant)
      Allows an applicant to delete an entire enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - the enquiry ID
      applicant - the applicant requesting deletion
      Returns:
      true if deletion successful
